Articles.Content: I want to make a map of Old KSC in Cities: Skylines, and I am looking for a high resolution Kerbin heightmap...

I believe some people have extracted it from here: http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Not sure how to do it exactly, a bit outside my wheelhouse.

I believe some people have extracted it from here: http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Not sure how to do it exactly, a bit outside my wheelhouse.

Actually I tried extracting it from there, but it's not black and white height map...

Try ScanSAT, it can export maps.

Maps exported from Scansat have a poor resolution... not fitting my needs.

---

Anyway I will continue trying to find heightmaps...
